dialogue.introduction: I'm the aircraft carrier Akagi. If you're forming a carrier division, just leave it to me.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the aircraft carrier, Akagi. As part of the core of the Mobile Strike Force, I support the victorious advances. Together with my pride experienced planes, we were called the invincible fleet. Overconfident, you say...? Hmm, perhaps so...I'll keep that in mind.
dialogue.secretary1: Ryuusei? Is that different from Type 97 Torpedo Bomber?
dialogue.secretary3: Are we hold a strategic meeting?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Um, Admiral? Is it mealti-No! Is it time to start the strategy meeting yet!?
dialogue.secretarymarried: 1st Carrier Division, Akagi, always ready to deploy! Admiral, please take a break sometime.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, if I'm with you, I might be able to change that fateful 5 minutes. I will do my best.
dialogue.show_players_score: There's a message for you, Admiral.
dialogue.equipment1: Thank you very much for the modernization.
dialogue.equipment2: I guess... the triple flight decks are not needed.
dialogue.supply: Thank you very much for resupplying my planes. It helps me a lot.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'll be preparing for the next operation.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: It seems like it will take a little time to repair the flight deck.
dialogue.docking_complete: The repairs for the docked ships have completed.
dialogue.ship_construction: A new vessel can take part in the task force.
dialogue.mvp: We must not become complacent following this victory. Reconnaissance and being proactive is the key... wait... what is this that sparked in my head?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I cannot let the pride of the first Carrier Division be lost here...
dialogue.sunk: My apologies... Please... scuttle me with the torpedoes.
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, Kaga-san, we’ve reached our second anniversary! I’m very happy, my thanks!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: It is the Rainy Season. Rainy today as well… On a day like this, taking a break at ‘Mamiya’ sounds nice too. Right, Admiral? Admiral?
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Oh, Kaga-san. Summer is coming. Eh? A new swimsuit? I had not thought about preparing it...
dialogue.christmas_2015: This is... Delicious. These are Christmas indeed. Ah, would you like some, Kaga-san?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Right. The 1st Carrier Division will proceed with the end-year spring cleaning as well. Cleaning up the hangar and the flight deck and... Yep, It's superb.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral. We, the 1st Carrier Division is present to greet you on this new year. It is a pleasure to be of service for this year.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's Setsubun. So I throw this bean at the light cruiser playing the demon role... Wait! Oh my, it's delicious~ Surprisingly... Oh dear! Ihts goohd~
